name: launcher
description: Productivity launcher: launch apps, control system, manage processes, quick calculations

tools.name: launch_app
tools.description: Launch an application by name or bundle ID

app.description: Application name (e.g. 'Chrome', 'VS Code') or bundle ID (e.g. 'com.google.Chrome')

newInstance.description: Force launch a new instance even if already running

tools.name: quit_app
tools.description: Quit an application gracefully or force quit

app.description: Application name or bundle ID to quit

tools.name: list_running_apps
tools.description: List all currently running applications with memory usage

tools.name: system_control
tools.description: Control system functions: volume, brightness, wifi, bluetooth, sleep, lock

value.description: Value for volume (0-100) or brightness (0-100) when setting specific levels

tools.name: quick_calc
tools.description: Perform quick calculations, unit conversions, or timezone conversions

expression.description: Math expression, unit conversion (e.g. '5 miles to km'), or timezone query (e.g. '3pm EST to PST')

tools.name: open_url
tools.description: Open a URL in the default browser or specific browser

url.description: URL to open (with or without http/https prefix)

browser.description: Specific browser: chrome, firefox, safari, edge

tools.name: process_manager
tools.description: List, search, or kill system processes

query.description: Process name to search for (when action is 'search' or 'kill')

pid.description: Process ID to kill (when action is 'kill')

tools.name: get_system_info
tools.description: Get system information: CPU, memory, disk, network, battery status

info.description: Type of system info to retrieve

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the screen or specific app window

app.description: Specific app name for window screenshot

save.description: Save to file instead of clipboard
